| History                 = Suncorp Properties was a hotel company who wished to built resorts on the northern shore of [[Santo Marco (Country)|Santo Marco]], expelling inhabitants from their villages in the process.<!-- {{r|Storm Vol 3 1}} -->

When a tsunami was about to hit such village, the [[Santo Marco Army (Earth-616)|army]] didn't arrived in time to evacuate a village, and [[Ororo Munroe (Earth-616)|Storm]] consequently intervened to stop it. Suncorp's soldiers arrived instants later (seemingly confused for the Army), inflicting upon Storm their anti-mutant bigotry. They then helped the inhabitants.<!-- {{r|Storm Vol 3 1}} -->

Soon, they returned as Storm did, to expel the inhabitants and take the land for a resort. A fight soon broke with Storm, who defeated the platoon and delivered them to local authorities, prompting [[Emilio Duarte (Earth-616)|President Duarte]] to swore to investigate. Expelled fishermen all along the northern shore soon kicked out Suncorp guards and reclaimed their villages.{{r|Storm Vol 3 1}}

The foiling of Suncorp's resort project destroyed a seventy-three million dollar annual revenue stream to [[Davis Harmon (Earth-616)|Davis Harmon]], who decided to target Storm.{{r|Storm Vol 3 8}}
